name: DinoMite
description:
A global disaster occured. The world is on fire, run faster and faster from zone to zone avoiding the obstacles along the way. You don't know where it will end or if it will end. All you know is RUN and don't look back

Endless Runner, procedurally generated with the best 5 high-scores saved in a binary encrypted file, available cross-platform (Windows PC, Linux, WebGL, Android). Every game is different from the previous one.
